title: Makeup Remover Mitt 2-Pack - with Just Water Remove Make up off Face and Eye - Reusable, Machine Washable and Chemical Free - Replaces Towelettes, Pads, Wipes, Oil and Cleansers
features: #1 Makeup Remover from Miss Landson with 290+ FIVE STAR reviews on Amazon. Our lovely customers love this cloth. You will love our new product of the line, the Mitt!

Removes make-up in seconds with JUST WATER, including waterproof mascara, in seconds. Reusable up to 1000 times, saves $$$. Machine washable, easy to care and low maintenance. REPLACES Towelettes, Pads, Wipes, Oil, & Cleansers.

Introducing the Mitt! The latest makeup remover of Miss Landson removers. It is easier to clean some hard to reach areas on your face. The mini mitt is great for removing makeup around your eyes. It also comes with a easy to carry plastic bag, which you can put into your bag and remove your makeup on the go.
Chemical Free with Premium Microfiber - Your skin deserves a relief after a long day with all of the chemical makeups. Save money on the remover pads and treat your skin nicely.
YOU WILL LOVE IT OR YOUR MONEY BACK - Order now and if you don't love it within 75 days, we will buy back from you. TOTALLY RISK FREE!
description: There is nothing worse than putting another layer of chemical stuffs on your face after wearing makeups all day. I was looking for some alternative solutions on the market to replace my makeup remover pads. But unfortunately most of so-claimed chemical free makeup remover cloths are just not good enough. Most of them are nothing different from the microfibre cloths sold in the supermarket in pennies, which make your skin dried out after...
So the Miss Landson Makeup Remover Mitt?

After talking to several suppliers and some beauty experts, we finally found this new form of microfiber to make the makeup remover cloth that I always wanted. It is more intense, softer and designed in a way to quickly remove makeup from the skin.  The Miss Landson Makeup Remover Mitt is a new product we have just developed. It is easier to grip in hand and can really help you with some hard to reach areas. The mini mitt is great for removing makeup around your eyes.
YOU WILL LOVE IT OR YOUR MONEY BACK. Order now and if you do not love it within 75 days, we will buy back from you. TOTALLY RISK FREE!
